title: More Interesting Return?
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss if the Astros should be favored over the Yankees in the ALCS, if Zion’s or Ben Simmons’ return tonight is more interesting and Booger McFarland joins the show for 5 Good Minutes. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: The ALCS starts tonight and if Zion’s or Ben Simmons’ return tonight is more interesting.
